opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Dretke, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division v. Haley

opinion:
540 U.S. 945

DRETKE, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION
v.
HALEY.

No. 02-1824.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 14, 2003.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 5th Cir.

2

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted. Reported below: 306 F. 3d 257.
